00001 module interp
00002     implicit none
00003     save
00004 
00005     !   interpolation initialisation arrays
00006 
00007     real, allocatable :: zp_bCurv_R(:), zp_bCurv_phi(:), zp_bCurv_z(:), 
00008         zp_bGrad_R(:), zp_bGrad_phi(:), zp_bGrad_z(:), 
00009         zp_bR(:), zp_bPhi(:), zp_bz(:), zp_bDotGradB(:), 
00010         zp_psi(:)
00011     real :: sigma = 0.0
00012 
00013 contains
00014     subroutine init_interp ()
00015         use gc_terms
00016         use eqdsk
00017         implicit none
00018  
00019         integer :: islpsw, iErr
00020         real, allocatable :: temp(:)
00021         real :: zx1(nh), zxm(nh), zy1(nw), zyn(nw), 
00022             zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn
00023         islpsw  = 255 
00024         allocate ( zp_bCurv_R(3*nw*nh), &
00025             zp_bCurv_phi(3*nw*nh), &
00026             zp_bCurv_z(3*nw*nh),&
00027             temp(nh+nh+nw), &
00028             zp_bGrad_R(3*nw*nh), &
00029             zp_bGrad_phi(3*nw*nh), &
00030             zp_bGrad_z(3*nw*nh), &
00031             zp_bDotGradB(3*nw*nh), &
00032             zp_bR(3*nw*nh), zp_bPhi(3*nw*nh), zp_bz(3*nw*nh), &
00033             zp_psi(3*nw*nh) )
00034 
00035         !   psi 
00036 
00037         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, psizr, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00038             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00039             zp_psi, temp, sigma, iErr)
00040      
00041         !   b field
00042 
00043         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, bR, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00044             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00045             zp_bR, temp, sigma, iErr)
00046         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, bPhi, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00047             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00048             zp_bPhi, temp, sigma, iErr)
00049         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, bz, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00050             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00051             zp_bz, temp, sigma, iErr)
00052  
00053         !   curvature 
00054     
00055         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, bCurvature_R, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00056             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00057             zp_bCurv_R, temp, sigma, iErr)
00058         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, bCurvature_phi, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00059             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00060             zp_bCurv_phi, temp, sigma, iErr)
00061         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, bCurvature_z, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00062             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00063             zp_bCurv_z, temp, sigma, iErr)
00064 
00065         !   gradient
00066 
00067         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, bGradient_R, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00068             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00069             zp_bGrad_R, temp, sigma, iErr)
00070         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, bGradient_phi, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00071             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00072             zp_bGrad_phi, temp, sigma, iErr)
00073         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, bGradient_z, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00074             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00075             zp_bGrad_z, temp, sigma, iErr)
00076 
00077         !   bDotGraB 
00078 
00079         call surf1 ( nw, nh, r, z, bDotGradB, nw, zx1, zxm, &
00080             zy1, zyn, zxy11, zxym1, zxy1n, zxymn, islpsw, &
00081             zp_bDotGradB, temp, sigma, iErr)
00082  
00083 
00084     end subroutine init_interp
00085 
00086 end module interp
